sentence: Other prominent Republican lawmakers, including Tennessee Sen. Marsha Blackburn and Ohio Rep. Jim Jordan, have signaled their intent to scrutinize the crowdfunding site.”
author: Ed Driscoll
title: GoFundMe and How the Left Came to Despise the Working Class

sentence: The second issue is what you just mentioned with Jim Jordan, and that is the apparent double standard here, which is that we have these giant tech giants, and they seem to have one standard for one political persuasion and one for the other.
title: 'Special Report' on Winter Olympics

author: RealClearWire
title: Are We Nuts? American Energy Is Key To Undermining Putin’s War
